intro: Urostigma onustum, commonly known as the redstem filaree, is an annual flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, commonly referred to as the buckwheat family. The plant features slender, reddish stems and small, clustered flowers that bloom in early spring. Its leaves are alternate, ovate, and often have a distinctive reddish tinge. Urostigma onustum is typically found in disturbed soils and is often considered a weed in agricultural settings.
